duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet customers, run the register, make purchase suggestions, and work around the store to maintain high standards for store appearance.
Interact with customers and work with a team to accomplish daily goals.
Provide prompt and courteous customer service, handle money, perform multi-function operation of fuel console, lottery machine, etc.
Maintain store cleanliness, control merchandise, and assist in maintaining proper inventory levels.
Perform all duties with minimal supervision, attend job-related meetings, and work with minimal direction.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred
